data.title: Lindsay Lohan Breaks Down Her Iconic Looks From Mean Girls, Freaky Friday & More
data.meta_description:
From her mall punk looks on 'Freaky Friday' to her killer '00s outfits on 'Get a Clue,' Lindsay Lohan has undoubtedly stolen our hearts with her on-screen style! Lindsay recalls how they executed the transition from "chill" Cady to "Mean Girl" Cady, the different hair colors she tried over the years and so much more.
Director: Jameer Pond
Director of Photography: Jack Belisle
Editor: Jess Lane
Creative Producer: Isabella Roman
